item.title: Multiple pot holes, 7th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes getting deeper and more opening up everyday. For a tight road itâ€™s becoming difficult and dangerous to drive around them.

item.title: Polehole, 7th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Hurstwood Avenue, Albany Park, Greater London

item.title: Power failure -STILL NOT FIXED! reported in October, 7th February
item.description:
This is a reoccurring fault. Full power failure needs investigating as keeps happening. Reported several months ago and nothing done! If you close this report please update the original

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmfield Road, Widmore, Greater London

item.title: Blocked drains, 7th February
item.description:
Constant deep puddle/flooding at BP garage exit possibly caused from blocked drains. Pedestrians are forced to walk into road or onto busy petrol station forecourt to avoid the deep water
